amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $5 billion in funds from the Overseas Contingency Operations Transfer Fund to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike funding for Overseas Contingency Operations Transfer Fund and apply it to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 314 (Roll no. 506).
